name: Star Slinger
description:
Star Slinger is a online multiplayer game that invites you and your friends to create a vast assortment of customized ships with one goal, Domination!

You have access to a in-game interface that enabled you to build and customize your ships using a vast assortment of parts.

This game is my submission for Search For A Star 2018 and is intended to be played as a 2-4 player game on multiple computers. Single player is possible for testing ships if you start a match by yourself. 

Controls 

Hanger

Block placement: Left mouse click

Block removal: Right mouse click

Block rotation : Right & Left Arrow

Mirroring: M

Block group selection: 1-4

Block group navigation: 1-4

In-Battle

Thruster Fire : W,A,S,D

Shoot: Left Mouse Click
